briefdescription.para: Current fire intensity (0.0 to 1.0).

detaileddescription.para: Set by shoot() and cleared when intensity is zero. Controls whether projectiles are spawned during update().

briefdescription.para: Cooldown interval between shots, in seconds.

detaileddescription.para: Derived from fireRate (1.0 / fireRate). Determines the minimum time that must pass between consecutive projectile spawns.

briefdescription.para: Accumulated time since last shot, in seconds.

detaileddescription.para: Accumulates delta time multiplied by intensity. When this value exceeds cooldownDelta, projectiles are spawned and the timer is reduced.

briefdescription.para: The projectile speed, in meters per second.
Velocity of the source object in three-dimensional space.

detaileddescription.para: Used to adjust the trajectory of projectiles emitted by the source's movement.

briefdescription.para: Fire rate per second, i.e. projectiles than can be shot per second.
Whether this component is enabled.
Checks whether this component is enabled.
Enables this component.
Disables this component.
Constructs a new ShootComponent with default settings.
Sets the shooting intensity.

detaileddescription.para: Call with a non-zero value to start shooting, or zero to stop. The intensity affects whether projectiles are spawned during update().

parameterdescription.para: Fire intensity (0.0 to 1.0). Zero stops firing.
The velocity of the object emitting the projectile.

briefdescription.para: Returns the cooldown interval between shots.

simplesect.para: Cooldown interval in seconds (derived from 1.0 / fireRate).

briefdescription.para: Returns the current fire intensity.
Returns the accumulated time since last shot.
Sets the accumulated cooldown timer.
Adds delta time to the cooldown timer.
Returns the projectile speed.

simplesect.para: Projectile speed in meters per second.

briefdescription.para: Sets the projectile speed.

parameterdescription.para: New projectile speed in meters per second.

briefdescription.para: Returns the source object's velocity.

simplesect.para: Velocity vector used for projectile trajectory adjustment.

briefdescription.para: Returns the fire rate in projectiles per second.
Sets the fire rate.

detaileddescription.para: Updates the cooldown delta based on the new fire rate.

parameterdescription.para: The number of projectiles per second. Must be greater than zero.

briefdescription.para: Component for handling projectile shooting with rate limiting.

detaileddescription.para: Manages the shooting mechanics for a GameObject by coordinating with aim-components for direction and a projectile pool for projectile spawning. Implements a cooldown timer to control fire rate.
